param.name: pay_method
param.label: Pay method
param.description: This selects the payment method during the checkout process.

param.name: x_secret
param.label: Secret word
param.description: Your Secret Word for 2Checkout.com. Makes the transactions more secure. The Secret Word should be a single or compound word or group of letters and numbers with no spaces. Examples: Monkey1mouse, 4smal3phone, gooblyWbubze.

param.name: x_email_merchant
param.label: Merchant Notifications
param.description: Should 2CheckOut e-mail a receipt to the site owner.

param.name: lang
param.label: Language
param.description: Set the equal to sp for Spanish purchase routine pages. English is the default if this parameter is absent, but you may pass in en as well.
